name: clickhouse-cargo
description: Accumulate local inserts and submit to clickhouse in batch jobs with retries on failure.

scripts.test01: export DEBUG=chcargo*; CLICKHOUSE_CARGO_PROFILE=playground nyc mocha --recursive ./lib/test/01-create-cargo.js -R spec
scripts.test02: export DEBUG=chcargo*; CLICKHOUSE_CARGO_PROFILE=playground nyc mocha --recursive ./lib/test/02-push-to-cargo.js -R spec
scripts.test03: export DEBUG=chcargo*; CLICKHOUSE_CARGO_PROFILE=playground nyc mocha --recursive ./lib/test/03-commit-bulk.js -R spec
scripts.test: export DEBUG=chcargo*; CLICKHOUSE_CARGO_PROFILE=playground nyc mocha --recursive ./lib/test -R spec

author: Yi
